site.name: Kaptai Crest Resort
site.tagline: A premium hill-lake retreat in Rangamati, Bangladesh
site.location: Kaptai Lake Shore, Reserve Bazar, Rangamati, Bangladesh

common.privateGuidedDeskDesc: Reception can arrange curated local routes with premium transport and activity combinations.

hero.title: Experience Rangamati From a Luxury Lakefront Resort
hero.description: Kaptai Crest blends hill-view suites, Kaptai Lake adventures, and curated cultural experiences inspired by Rangamati.

featuredSuites.title: Featured Suites
featuredSuites.description: Refined room concepts built for comfort, privacy, and uninterrupted views.

items.name: Kaptai Panorama Suite
items.description: Private balcony with uninterrupted views of Kaptai Lake and surrounding green hills.

items.name: Shuvolong Cliff Villa
items.description: Two-level villa with open deck, ideal for family stays and private gatherings.

items.name: Jhulonto Bridge Residence
items.description: Signature suite inspired by Rangamati architecture with personalized butler support.

topActivities.title: Top Activities
topActivities.description: Guest-favorite experiences available daily across the resort zone.

items.name: Sunset Kayaking
items.description: Guided kayaking routes across calm Kaptai Lake channels during golden hour.

items.name: Lake Swimming
items.description: Controlled swim zones and resort pool decks with hill-lake views.

items.name: Hill Camping
items.description: Overnight camp setup on scenic hill points near Rangamati viewpoints.

hero.title: Rooms & Suites
hero.description: Choose from hill-view rooms, lakefront suites, and premium villas designed for Rangamati stays.

items.name: Standard Room
items.description: A calm space for short stays with premium bedding and smart workspace.

items.name: Luxury Room
items.description: Balanced layout with lounge seating and a private balcony corner.

items.name: Premium Suite
items.description: Panoramic glass views with integrated living and dining setup.

items.name: Family Villa
items.description: Large multi-room villa ideal for family trips and private celebrations.

items.name: Honeymoon Loft
items.description: Romantic loft with curated decor and exclusive evening setup.

items.name: Presidential Residence
items.description: Flagship suite with elevated service layers and private sea lounge.

hero.title: Dining & Chef's Specials
hero.description: Enjoy hill-inspired cuisine, freshwater fish, and bamboo-cooked specials rooted in Rangamati flavors.

specials.title: Chef's Specials
specials.description: Daily signature dishes curated by our executive culinary team.

items.name: Bamboo Chicken Platter
items.description: Slow-cooked chicken in bamboo with hill herbs and smoky aroma.

items.name: Kaptai Lake Grilled Fish
items.description: Fresh lake fish grilled over charcoal with citrus and local spice.

items.name: Pahari Vegetable Medley
items.description: Seasonal hill vegetables tossed with sesame and mild aromatic spice.

items.name: Rangamati Rice Cake Plate
items.description: Traditional pitha selection with date syrup and fruits.

items.name: Hill Honey Fruit Bowl
items.description: Seasonal fruits with local honey and yogurt.

items.name: Kaptai Rui Fish Curry
items.description: Freshwater fish curry served with steamed rice and greens.

items.name: Bamboo Shoot Beef
items.description: Slow-cooked beef with bamboo shoot and aromatic herbs.

items.name: Smoked Hill Chicken
items.description: Char-smoked chicken with roasted vegetables and garlic rice.

items.name: Chakma Spiced River Prawn
items.description: River prawn in mild Chakma spice blend and herb butter.

hero.title: Travel Around Rangamati
hero.description: Discover lake routes, waterfalls, monasteries, and cultural landmarks around Rangamati.

trending.title: Trending Places
trending.description: Horizontal highlights of the most requested nearby spots.

items.name: Hanging Bridge (Jhulonto Setu)
items.description: Rangamatiâ€™s iconic bridge with panoramic lake photography points.

items.name: Shuvolong Waterfall
items.description: Popular waterfall route across Kaptai Lake with scenic hill backdrop.

items.name: Rajban Vihara
items.description: A serene Buddhist monastery known for architecture and spiritual calm.

items.name: Kaptai Lake Sunset Point
items.description: Golden-hour lake views and private boat cruise boarding area.

explore.title: Places to Explore
explore.description: Balanced recommendations for nature, heritage, and leisure.

items.name: Tribal Cultural Institute
items.description: Explore the heritage, crafts, and stories of indigenous communities.

items.name: Chakma Rajbari Area
items.description: A historically important area tied to Chakma royalty and local governance.

items.name: Kaptai National Park Edge
items.description: Forest-edge trails with hill breeze, birds, and photo stops.

items.name: Polwel Park
items.description: Family-friendly park zone with lake viewpoints and picnic spaces.

items.name: Jublee Tila Viewpoint
items.description: Elevated Rangamati viewpoint for sunrise and skyline photography.

items.name: Banarupa Local Market
items.description: Local handicrafts, hill spices, and authentic daily Rangamati culture.

hero.title: Adventure Activities
hero.description: Curated activity programs designed around Kaptai Lake and Rangamati hill terrain.

items.name: Kayaking
items.description: Guided kayaking on Kaptai Lake with safety support and photo stops.

items.name: Swimming
items.description: Resort infinity pool and controlled lake swim zones for families.

items.name: Camping
items.description: Overnight hill camping with bonfire dinner and sunrise viewpoints.

items.name: Swing
items.description: Signature hillside swing overlooking Kaptai Lake and green valleys.

hero.title: Resort Packages
hero.description: Bundled plans combining room stays, lake activities, and local Rangamati experiences.

items.name: Lake Adventure Combo
items.description: Kaptai Kayaking + Hill Camping + Bonfire Dinner

items.name: Rangamati Family Escape
items.description: Luxury Room + Swimming + Breakfast Buffet

hero.title: Contact & Location
hero.description: Reach our Rangamati reception team for room reservations, lake tours, and private events.

contact.mapDescription: Located beside Kaptai Lake near Reserve Bazar, with easy access by road and private boat.
